long_description: The Smith Terrace sunglasses provide complete coverage and full UV protection while offering casual style that looks great while walking to work or combing the beach. Polycarbonate lenses reduce glare and feature 100% UV protection. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nosepiece and temple ends on the Smith Terrace sunglasses become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Frames are made from bio-plastic Rislan(R) Clear (derived from non-GMO castor seeds) for a resilient, durable and consistent fit.
short_description: The Smith Terrace sunglasses provide complete coverage and full UV protection while offering casual style that looks great while walking to work or combing the beach.
